SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, invoice_month, data_amount, amount_type_code, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, data_text, data_text2, data_text3, data_text4, data_date, afa_invoice_manual_data_id FROM elp_afa_invoice_manaul_data WHERE afa_invoice_manual_data_id = :afa_invoice_manual_data_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select md.dealer_id, md.INVOICE_MONTH , d.dealer || ' - ' || d.dealer_name as dealer_name , sum(case when md.amount_type_code = 'MDF' then md.DATA_AMOUNT else 0 end) MDFReconAmount , sum(case when md.amount_type_code = 'CESSLOSS' then md.DATA_AMOUNT else 0 end) CessionLossAmount , max(elita.ELP_AFA_ACCT_TRANS.IsSSGLFilePosted(d.dealer, md.INVOICE_MONTH)) SSGLFilePosted from elp_afa_invoice_manaul_data md inner join elp_dealer d on d.dealer_id = md.dealer_id where md.dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_in_clause and md.amount_type_code in ('MDF', 'CESSLOSS') group by md.dealer_id, md.INVOICE_MONTH, d.dealer || ' - ' || d.dealer_name order by INVOICE_MONTH desc
SQL.LOAD_MONTHLY_AMOUNTS: SELECT dealer_id, invoice_month, data_amount, amount_type_code, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, data_text, data_text2, data_text3, data_text4, data_date, afa_invoice_manual_data_id from elp_afa_invoice_manaul_data md where md.dealer_id = :dealer_id and invoice_month = :invoice_month
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_afa_invoice_manaul_data SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, invoice_month = :invoice_month, data_amount = :data_amount, amount_type_code = :amount_type_code, data_text = :data_text, data_text2 = :data_text2, data_text3 = :data_text3, data_text4 = :data_text4, data_date = :data_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE afa_invoice_manual_data_id = :afa_invoice_manual_data_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_afa_invoice_manaul_data ( dealer_id, invoice_month, data_amount, amount_type_code, created_by, data_text, data_text2, data_text3, data_text4, data_date, afa_invoice_manual_data_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :invoice_month, :data_amount, :amount_type_code, :created_by, :data_text, :data_text2, :data_text3, :data_text4, :data_date, :afa_invoice_manual_data_id )
SQL.LOAD_LIST_PONumber: select md.dealer_id, md.INVOICE_MONTH , d.dealer || ' - ' || d.dealer_name as dealer_name , md.DATA_TEXT as PONumber , md.AFA_INVOICE_MANUAL_DATA_ID , to_Char(to_date( md.INVOICE_MONTH || '01', 'yyyymmdd'), 'Month YYYY') as Invoice_Month_Desc from elp_afa_invoice_manaul_data md inner join elp_dealer d on d.dealer_id = md.dealer_id where md.dealer_id = :dealer_id and md.amount_type_code = 'PONUM' --dynamic_in_clause order by INVOICE_MONTH desc
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_TYPE: select * from elp_afa_invoice_manaul_data md where md.dealer_id = :dealer_id and md.amount_type_code = :amount_type_code --dynamic_in_clause
SQL.LOAD_INVOICE_DATES: select D.DEALER, D.DEALER_NAME, D.DEALER_ID ,p.INVOICE_MONTH ,I.AFA_INVOICE_DATA_ID ,NVL(TRIM(EXTRACT(i.Invoice_xml_data, '/InvoiceData/InvoiceDate/text()')), 'Not Available') as InvoiceDate ,NVL(TRIM(EXTRACT(i.Invoice_xml_data, '/InvoiceData/DueDate/text()')), 'Not Available') as DueDate ,nvl((select to_char(max(data_date), 'mm/dd/yyyy') from elita.ELP_AFA_INVOICE_MANAUL_DATA where dealer_id = d.dealer_id and invoice_month = p.INVOICE_MONTH and trim(upper(Amount_Type_Code)) = 'DATE_INVOICE' ), 'Not Available') as ManualInvoiceDate ,nvl((select to_char(max(data_date), 'mm/dd/yyyy') from elita.ELP_AFA_INVOICE_MANAUL_DATA where dealer_id = d.dealer_id and invoice_month = p.INVOICE_MONTH and trim(upper(Amount_Type_Code)) = 'DATE_INV_DUE' ), 'Not Available') as ManualDueDate from ELP_dEALER d INNER JOIN (SELECT :invoice_month AS INVOICE_MONTH FROM DUAL) p on 1=1 left outer JOIN afa.ELP_AFA_INVOICE_DATA I ON D.DEALER_ID = I.DEALER_ID and nvl(i.DELETED, 'N') = 'N' AND i.INVOICE_MONTH = p.INVOICE_MONTH where d.dealer_id = :dealer_id --dynamic_in_clause
